Question & Options:
Which of the following accolades were associated with the movie 'Satyam Shivam Sundaram' released in 2014?
Options:
A. Best Music Director - Laxmikant-Pyarelal at the 26th Filmfare Awards
B. Best Director - Raj Kapoor at the 26th Filmfare Awards
C. Best Film at the 26th Filmfare Awards
D. Best Music Album at the 26th Filmfare Awards
Correct Answer: Best Music Director - Laxmikant-Pyarelal at the 26th Filmfare Awards

Question & Options:
Which accolades did the movie 'Satyam Shivam Sundaram' (2014) receive related to its cinematography?
Options:
A. Nominated for Best Cinematography at the 26th Filmfare Awards
B. Won Best Cinematography at the 26th Filmfare Awards
C. Nominated for Best Editing at the 26th Filmfare Awards
D. Nominated for Best Art Direction at the 26th Filmfare Awards
Correct Answer: Nominated for Best Cinematography at the 26th Filmfare Awards

Question & Options:
Which of the following accolades are associated with the movie 'Satyam Shivam Sundaram' released in 2014?

A. Nominated for Best Director at the 26th Filmfare Awards
B. Won Best Director at the 26th Filmfare Awards

Correct Answer: Nominated for Best Director at the 26th Filmfare Awards, Directed by Raj Kapoor

Question & Options:

Correct Answer: Zeenat Aman won the Best Actress award at the 26th Filmfare Awards., Zeenat Aman won the Best Actress award at the 26th Filmfare Awards for her performance in this movie.
